going all the way round and almost back to the start again :

http://code=
.quirkey.com/sammy/

... perhaps ?

>
> On Fri, Jan 8, 2010 at 9:24 AM, Gui=
lherme Silveira <guilherme.silveira@...
> > wrote:
>
> Flex/flash based ones also, although they can play around w=
ith=20
> anchors, they usually do not create real pages: http://www.tucano.org.br=
/portal.html
>
> Everything you click is an anchor, not another web page, t=
herefore=20
> google can not index it.
>
>
> There are also web application where almo=
st every page is a form=20
> that POSTs back to the same never-changing URL. Even "links" that=20
> you click actually just run javascript to submit the form.
>
>
